metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to UI/UX Design Project
metadata.justification: The content contains an explicit, active RFP for a Digital Transformation Project issued by American Cricket Enterprises (Major League Cricket's entity). This directly matches the hypothesis of procurement readiness for a UI/UX Design Project, as digital transformation projects encompass UI/UX design components to improve fan experience and optimize systems.

evidence.content: American Cricket Enterprises has issued an RFP for a Digital Transformation Project. This solution will improve the fan experience, optimize commercial opportunities and integrate with existing and new systems for ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more whilst also maintaining compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws. Proposals due on 10 October, 2025.

metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to Python Data Processing Project
metadata.justification: The content shows an active RFP for a 'Digital Transformation Project' that includes data integration and processing, which aligns with the Python Data Processing Project hypothesis. However, it's a general digital transformation RFP, not specifically focused on Python data processing.

evidence.content: American Cricket Enterprises has issued an RFP for a Digital Transformation Project. This solution will improve the fan experience, optimize commercial opportunities and integrate with existing and new systems for ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more whilst also maintaining compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws.
